# Exploratory Data Analysis of CO2

We can k

```{r info}
?CO2
```

```{r summary}
summary(CO2)
```

```{r str}
str(CO2)
```

```{r hist}
hist(CO2$uptake)
```

```{r}
qqnorm(CO2$uptake)
qqline(CO2$uptake)
```


```{r}
plot(CO2$conc, CO2$uptake)
abline(lm(uptake~conc, CO2))
```

```{r}
plot(CO2$conc, CO2$uptake, col=CO2$Treatment, pch=CO2$Type)
```
